page.title: 10Housing
page.content: In Fullready and Pillerton Hersey most of the houses are old and made of stone. In Pillerton Priors the houses are made from varios materials because there are more new houses in Pillerton Priors than Pillerton Hersey or Fullready. Pillerton Priors is convenient for people who work in Banbury and Stratford because it is on a good quality B.road(B4451).There are bungalows where the elderly live but generally the population is younger. Pillerton Hersey has a Manor House and retains a greater amount of older properties.Fullready has mainly farm houses and only two workers cottages which are brick built but of the late Victorian era.All the properties in the villages have mains water, electricity and sewage system.Most have central heating either fired by oil or solid fuel.
